data.comment: The match is underway. Saint Petersburg have kicked-off.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg.
In the minute 2, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 5, Artem Dzyuba for Saint Petersburg drives towards goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Aleksandr Yerokhin (Saint Petersburg) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tula.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 8, Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 12, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Saint Petersburg's Yuri Zhirkov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 12, Arsenal Tula's Kirill Panchenko breaks free at Arsenal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Saint Petersburg a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal Tula in Tula.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Arsenal Stadium.
Arsenal Tula are coming forward and Alesandr Lomovitskiy gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
In the minute 21, Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Saint Petersburg's area.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 24, Arsenal Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Saint Petersburg at Arsenal Stadium.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 29, Saint Petersburg to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Yuri Zhirkov of Saint Petersburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
In Tula Saint Petersburg attack through Wilmar Barrios. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 33, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint Petersburg's half?
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Free kick Saint Petersburg.
Alesandr Lomovitskiy for Arsenal Tula has been booked by Evgeniy Kukulyak and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Kirill Panchenko for Arsenal Tula gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Saint Petersburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Saint Petersburg in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula's Evans Kangwa has been booked in Tula.
Saint Petersburg are pushing forward but Yuri Zhirkov's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tula.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Arsenal Stadium.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 46, It's Arsenal Tula with the kick-off after the break.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Saint Petersburg.
Artem Dzyuba for Saint Petersburg is whistled offside.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg at Arsenal Stadium.
Can Saint Petersburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal Tula defender.
In the minute 49, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Saint Petersburg's Dmitri Chistyakov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
In the minute 52, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Ball safe as Saint Petersburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 55, Yuri Kovalev is replacing Vladislav Panteleyev for the home team.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Saint Petersburg territory.
In the minute 57, Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Saint Petersburg.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Saint Petersburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg just outside Arsenal Tula's area.
In the minute 62, Sardar Azmoun is replacing Aleksandr Yerokhin for Saint Petersburg at Arsenal Stadium.
Important block from the Saint Petersburg defence as Kirill Panchenko fires in a strike for Arsenal Tula.
Malcom for Saint Petersburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba gets in a shot on goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Georgi Kostadinov (Arsenal Tula) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 74, Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Kirill Panchenko gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal Tula.
Saint Petersburg have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 75, In Tula Saint Petersburg drive forward through Aleksey Sutormin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Dmitri Parfenov is making the team's second substitution at Arsenal Stadium with Anri Hagush replacing Artem Sokol.
Evgeniy Kukulyak blows against Saint Petersburg's Artem Dzyuba for offside.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Valeri Gromyko is on a sub for Alesandr Lomovitskiy for Arsenal Tula.
The away team have replaced Sebastian Driussi with Leon Musaev. This is the second substitution made today by Sergey Semak.
In the minute 77, Saint Petersburg make their third substitution with Andrey Mostovoy replacing Yuri Zhirkov.
Saint Petersburg's Andrey Mostovoy breaks free at Arsenal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 79, Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint Petersburg's half?
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Saint Petersburg throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
The home team replace Luka Djordjevic with Roman Minaev.
In the minute 83, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Saint Petersburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
Saint Petersburg needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Arsenal Tula's Georgi Kostadinov is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
Free kick for Saint Petersburg in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Saint Petersburg in their own half.
Saint Petersburg push forward at Arsenal Stadium and Daler Kuzyaev gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal Tula defence.
Corner awarded to Saint Petersburg.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Kirill Panchenko (Arsenal Tula) has received a first yellow card.
Sergey Semak (Saint Petersburg) is making a fourth substitution, with Daniil Shamkin replacing Artem Dzyuba.
At Arsenal Stadium, Wilmar Barrios for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
